valid: For the period 06:00 (UTC) on Sat 7 Feb 2026 to 06:00 (UTC) on Sun 8 Feb 2026
general_synopsis: Low Fastnet 981expected Irish Sea 993 by midnight tonight. New low expected Biscay 999 by same time

Viking.text:
Wind
In southwest, southeasterly 4 to 6, increasing 7 or gale 8 later in south. In northeast, southeasterly 4 to 6, occasionally 7 later.
Sea state
In southwest, very rough, occasionally rough at first. in northeast, slight or moderate, becoming mainly rough.
Weather
Occasional sleet.
Visibility
In southwest, good, occasionally poor. In northeast, good, occasionally poor.

Gale warning
Issued:
09:54 (UTC) on Fri 6 Feb 2026
Southeasterly gale force 8 expected later
